definition: wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商独资企业，自主经营进出口业务。

sentences.english: One-man company cannot replace sole proprietorship each other.
sentences.chinese: 一人公司和个人独资企业不能互相取代。

sentences.english: The almanac skin has the handbag factory for the domestic soleownership handbag manufacture enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 通胜皮具手袋制造厂为国内独资手袋制造企业。

sentences.english: This is a company specialized in producing all kinds of bags of wholly foreign-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家专业生产各种包袋的外商独资企业。

sentences.english: QZ Pet is a Canadian enterprise built in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 强中玩具系加拿大独资企业，创建于2003年。

sentences.english: BATT Consulting Services Company was set up in 2002.
sentences.chinese: BATT咨询服务公司是一家外商独资企业。

sentences.english: Can the sole proprietorship tendency of the transnational companies in China be reversed?
sentences.chinese: 在华跨国公司的独资化倾向有可能被扭转吗？

sentences.english: Anchi Auto Brake (Shenzhen) Co. , LTD is located in SHENZHEN South China, established in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司成立于1994年，是一家外商独资企业。

sentences.english: to review and verify company regulations of wholly state-owned enterprises financed by the Commission.
sentences.chinese: 承办所出资的国有独资公司章程的审核工作。

sentences.english: Yike Machinery Co. , Ltd. of Singapore and construction of wholly-owned subsidiary of China Group.
sentences.chinese: 艾柯机械有限公司是新加坡建和集团中国独资子公司。

sentences.english: Qingdao Nouanz Packaging Machinery Manufacture Co. , Ltd. is a specialized American-owned company.
sentences.chinese: 是美商在华独资生产包装机械的专业化企业。

sentences.english: Enterprises wholly owned by foreigners are now allowed.
sentences.chinese: 现在中国允许外商独资用油企业。

sentences.english: Foreign self-funded job referral service agencies are disallowed.
sentences.chinese: 不得设立外商独资职业介绍机构。

sentences.english: Pledgee is a wholly foreign-owned enterprise registered in China.
sentences.chinese: 质权人是一家在中国注册的外商独资企业。

sentences.english: So what’s a solo entrepreneur to do?
sentences.chinese: 那么，一个独资企业家该采取怎样的措施呢？

definition: wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4

definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
